attributes.action: provide a system giving taxpayers a direct influence in how their tax is used.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Every contributor to the exchequer, individual and corporate, should be provided with a breakdown showing in significant detail how the Government has budgeted to spend our money over the coming year. 
Taxpayers, and shareholders in taxed corporations, must be allowed to veto the use of their tax for any purpose they consider undesirable or morally unacceptable.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
